name: Porcini
description:
The hero of the game "Porcini" is the smartest mushroom in the world of crystals.
In the game, you participate in moving crystals to connect match-three and solving puzzles.

The game takes place in the world of mushrooms "Womus". To pass a level, you need to collect match-three to gain points and move to a new level through the teleport.

Game features:
  • Fast moves
  • Solving puzzles like in a match-three)
  • Collect coins, everyone loves coins
